files.patch:
@@ -79,1 +79,5 @@
-    LDFLAGS_LTO="-flto=auto -fuse-linker-plugin -fno-strict-aliasing"
+    if test "x$OPENJDK_TARGET_OS" = xmacosx; then
+      LDFLAGS_LTO="-flto=auto -Wl,-object_path_lto,lto.o -fuse-linker-plugin -fno-strict-aliasing"
+    else
+      LDFLAGS_LTO="-flto=auto -fuse-linker-plugin -fno-strict-aliasing"
+    fi
